mapper.select: SELECT id typeId,parent_id typeParentId,`name`typeName,code typeCode FROM bo_product_type WHERE id = #{productTypeId} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_disable = 0
SELECT id typeId,code typeCode,`name` typeName,parent_id typeParentId FROM bo_product_type WHERE is_delete = 0 AND is_disable = 0
